description: This file defines an Angular component 'AuthComponent' used for authentication with login and signup modes. It manages user input for email and password, emits events for login/signup, and handles validation and error messaging.

classes.name: AuthComponent
classes.description: Angular component for user authentication with login/signup modes, handling user input and emitting events.

methods.name: doAuth
methods.description: Handles authentication action based on current mode; validates input and emits corresponding event.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^  @Output() login = new EventEmitter<{ email: string, password: string }>();$/

fields.name: @Output() login = new EventEmitter<{ email: string, password: string }>();
